F.A.Q.


Q: Where are your servers located?

A: Los Angeles, California and Phoenix,AZ and Seattle,WA,USA


Q: What happens if I go over the monthly-allocated bandwidth?

A: Your VPS will be suspended until bandwidth resets or you’ll have to upgrade to a higher package.



Q: When does bandwidth reset then?

A: Bandwidth is reset on the 1st of each month.


Q: How long does it take to setup a VPS?

A: Setup may will take 1-24 hours after we receive your payment.


Q: Do you allow VPN & proxies on your server?

A: Yes, you we allow VPN & proxies on our servers.



Q: Do you allow IRC on your server?

A: No, we do not allow IRC or any IRC related services on our servers.
